templates.footer: <style>@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Inconsolata:400,700'); @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:100,100i,300,300i,400,400i,500,500i,700,700i,900,900i'); code, pre, .sunlight-highlighted, .sunlight-container, .sunlight-container textarea { font-family: 'Inconsolata' !important; font-size: 14px !important; line-height: 1.3 !important;} body { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; } #toc-content { padding-top: 30px; }</style>
